ygData.subject: Re: Magical Gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve tried using netted gloves to hit wisps, they seem to only work for monks hand to hand attacks.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: John Buenavides <jbuenavides@...>
>
>I've been trying to give my bard some method of magical attacks to
>supplement his dissonance (I'm currently level 11 -- can't wait until
>I get below).
>
>So, questions:
>
>1. How much does dissonance with and without the lute/mandolin
> at each level? I've heard 16 damage at level 30, but that
> doesn't help when you're having a hard time getting up to
> 20 in the first place.
>
>2. I took the very long trip to Innothule and spent a few hours
> killing frogloks for netted armor. Now, mind you, I made a
> pretty good profit selling all the rusty weapons I could haul
> to Oasis, and I have an almost complete set of netted armor
> to auction off. But I thought that having netted gloves
> (which are magical) would let me fight hand to hand against
> magic-only monsters.


I've tried using netted gloves to hit wisps, they seem to only work
for monks hand to hand attacks.

>
>3. Are there any weapons/armor out there that we can use as bards
> to supplement our instrumental damage songs?
>
>
